text: Qahhor Mahkamov (; alternative spelling Kahar Mahkamov; born April 16, 1932 â€“ June 8, 2016) was a Tajik politician. He served as First Secretary of the Communist Party of Tajikistan and was the first President of Tajikistan. He served as president from 1990 through 1991. ==References== ==Other websites== * Obituary Category:1932 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Presidents of Tajikistan
title: Qahhor Mahkamov
